When a friend was visiting David, it began to rain. So David told him not to go home that night. "You may stay here _ the night," he said. "OK," answered his friend.

When David would  go to bed, his friend returned . He was all wet through.
"Where did you go  just now?"asked David.
"I went home ,"answered the friend, "to tell my mother that I'll not go home _ the rain stops tomorrow."
